Title: Assault: The Warring Clans
Description:
The opportunistic mogu clans seek to take the Vale while its defenders are recovering from N'Zoth's attack. 

They are both cowardly and foolish.

Show them the error of their ways.
ObjectivesText: Drive back the Mogu Assault in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
AreaDescription: Return to Stormspeaker Qian in the Silent Sanctuary.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Stormspeaker Qian in the Silent Sanctuary.
